thread.title: Alexandra Paterson

author: Alexandra Paterson
title: Alexandra Paterson
text: I have been using Tails now for 3 months I would highly recommend them to anyone that values their dogs. my wee Leo loves the food and goes crazy when he see the bag. I think it's great as you can place your order on hold or get it early and is delivered when stated. I love how the food is tailored to your dog so the food I get is for my dogs needs. I would not use any other dog food they are the best.
